nodes.text: Star Wars: The Phantom Menace Manga
Star Wars: The Phantom Menace Manga is the manga adaptation of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. It is written by Kia Asamiya and was published on December 14, 2018.
The manga adaptation of Episode 1 of the Star Wars saga.

Two Jedi peace ambassadors are sent to investigate the Trade Federation blockade of Naboo and later meet Anakin Skywalker, a young slave living on Tatooine, whom they believe to be a good candidate for Jedi training. Unbeknownst to them, the Sith, agents of the Dark Side of the Force, lurk in the shadows with a sinister plot.
